content:
MainForm MainForm Class

Definition

Namespace:
DeviceExplorer
Assembly:
DeviceExplorer.dll

Provides the following functionalities:

  • CRUD operations for devices
  • Receiving Events from a device
  • Sending Messages to a device
Edit

In this Article
